# IOLockUnlock | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IOLockUnlock ](/documentation/driverkit/iolockunlock)

-  IOLockUnlock 

Function# IOLockUnlock

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
void IOLockUnlock(struct IOLock * lock);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/driverkit/iolockunlock#parameters)

`lock`Pointer to the allocated lock.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iolockunlock#discussion)

Unlock a mutex.

Unlock the mutex and wake any blocked waiters. Results are undefined if the caller has not locked the mutex.
